Package org.ro.tuc.pt.businessLayer

Class OrdersOperations

java.lang.Object
org.ro.tuc.pt.businessLayer.OrdersOperations
public class OrdersOperations
extends java.lang.Object
This class will be used for managing order operations. It reads from and writes to the order table in the database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    OrdersOperations​(ConnectionFactory connectionFactory, MainFrame mainFrame)
    Creates a new instance of OrdersOperations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int addProduct​(Product product, int quantity)
    Attempts to add a new product to the order.

    float getTotalPrice()  
    void placeOrder​(ProductsOperations productsOperations)
    Used when the user attempts to place an order.
    void reset()
    It deletes all the orders that were not yet placed.
    java.lang.String toStringGUI​(ProductsOperations productsOperations)
    Used to display the current status of the unfinished order.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • OrdersOperations

      public OrdersOperations​(ConnectionFactory connectionFactory, MainFrame mainFrame)
      Creates a new instance of OrdersOperations.
      Parameters:
      connectionFactory - is the object holding the connection to the database.
      mainFrame - is the main window of the application, which will have to be updated in this class when client changes are made.

  • Method Details

    • reset

      public void reset()
      It deletes all the orders that were not yet placed. It is used every time the orders window is left so all unfinished orders will be lost.

    • getNewID

      public int getNewID()
      Returns:
      the id that will be assigned to the next order introduced into the database.

    • getTotalPrice

      public float getTotalPrice()
      Returns:
      the total price of all the items that are currently in the 'cart'.

    • addProduct

      public int addProduct​(Product product, int quantity)
      Attempts to add a new product to the order.
      Parameters:
      product - the object of Product type that will be added.
      quantity - the quantity of the desired product.
      Returns:
      0 if the product was successfully added to the order, -1 if the quantity is larger than the available stock.

    • toStringGUI

      public java.lang.String toStringGUI​(ProductsOperations productsOperations)
      Used to display the current status of the unfinished order.
      Parameters:
      productsOperations - object of ProductsOperations type, needed to get additional information abut the products.
      Returns:
      an object of String type to be displayed in the GUI, containing the total price, the names, prices and quantities of the products in the order.

    • placeOrder

      public void placeOrder​(ProductsOperations productsOperations)
      Used when the user attempts to place an order. It sets the idClient and the dateAndTime of the orders, reduces the stock of the products, updates the database, creates the newID for the next order and creates a bill.
      Parameters:
      productsOperations - object of ProductsOperations type, needed to get additional information about the products.
